attributes.action: An Urgent Review Of The Prescribing/Administering Of high Risk Drugs Across The NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An Urgent Review is required of all Hospital Protocols and Proceadures for the Storing,Prescribing,Preparing and Administering of High Risk Drugs eg:Amphotericin and calling for the Implementation of a Standard National Protocol across the NHS to prevent further Deaths from Drug Errors to avoid other families going through the same tragedy. My Husband died in July 2007 due to a Drug Error this CANNOT happen again, lets make the NHS safer for Patients.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to an Urgent Review Of The Prescribing/Administering Of high Risk Drugs Across The NHS.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Blunders


Her Majesty's Government
